==== t1.ts (0 errors) ====
    export var x = "x";
    export var y = "y";
    
==== t2.ts (0 errors) ====
    export { x as y, y as x } from "./t1";
    
==== t3.ts (0 errors) ====
    import { x, y } from "./t1";
    export { x as y, y as x };
